abstract: Family of Darrien Hunt, who was killed by police in Saratoga Springs, Utah, while wielding samurai sword, files lawsuit against police officers and the city, seeking more than $2 million in damages.
lead_paragraph: The family of a young man killed by the police in Saratoga Springs while wielding a samurai sword filed a civil rights lawsuit Friday against the officers and the city.
snippet: The family of a young man killed by the police in Saratoga Springs while wielding a samurai sword filed a civil rights lawsuit Friday against the officers and the city.

headline.main: Utah: Family Sues Police Dept. in Death of Man Who Had Sword
headline.print_headline: Utah: Family Sues Police Dept. in Death of Man Who Had Sword
